settings.title: Online shopping includes both buying things online.
settings.sub_title: Salesforce B2C Commerce can help you create unified, intelligent digital commerce experiences — both online and in the store.
settings.content: Publish your eCommerce site quickly with our easy-to-use store builder— no coding required. Migrate your items from your point of sale system or turn your Instagram feed into a shopping site and start selling fast. Square Online works for all kinds of businesses—retail, restaurants, services.

settings.review_content: It's amazing how much easier it has been to meet new people and create instantly non connections. I have the exact same personal the only thing that has changed is my mind set and a few behaviors.
